title: The Seven Wonders of the WorldLecture notes on 21st-century physics
text:
Working draft 0.5, updated 2026-02-09

















P.G.Luca Porta Mana



No large language models were used in the preparation of these lecture notes and of their accompanying material, except in some exercises that specifically target LLMs.
